narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: National Mentor Healthcare, LLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Broomall, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $44.6M in Medicaid payments across 244K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $44.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
